parts.text:
```xml
<output>
<analysis>
<has-cmf>The provided post does not contain a CMF number.  While the absence of a CMF number doesn't automatically exclude it from being electoral propaganda, it suggests it might not be directly linked to an officially registered campaign.</has-cmf>
<refers-to-candidate>The post explicitly mentions "Valeriu Iftime" and implicitly refers to the PNL party ("Votăm echipa PNL").  While it doesn't provide a full name or other identifying details, the context strongly suggests a reference to a candidate associated with the PNL. This fulfills "Article 36 (7) - a".</refers-to-candidate>
<addresses-the-wide-population>The post is a paid Facebook advertisement, inherently designed to reach a wide audience. The use of Facebook as a platform and the paid nature of the post strongly suggest it addresses the wide population. This fulfills "Article 36 (7) - c".</addresses-the-wide-population>
<electoral-objective>The phrase "Hai la vot pe 1 decembrie! Votăm echipa PNL - Valeriu Iftime!" directly encourages voting for a specific candidate and party. The clear intention is to influence the outcome of the election by increasing votes for Valeriu Iftime and the PNL. This fulfills "Article 36 (7) - c".</electoral-objective>
<journalism>The post lacks any journalistic elements. It's a straightforward call to action, not an informative or analytical piece. It does not provide news, analysis, or opinions on political events in an objective manner.</journalism>
<personal_opinion>The post does not express a personal opinion; it's a direct appeal for votes, lacking any personal reflection or subjective viewpoint.</personal_opinion>
</analysis>

<conclusion>
<post_id>1606080077000792</post_id>
<electoral-propaganda-analysis>
The post fulfills all criteria of electoral propaganda as defined by Article 36 (7) of LEGE nr. 334 din 17 iulie 2006. It refers to a specific candidate (Valeriu Iftime) and party (PNL), targets a wide audience through a paid Facebook advertisement, and has the clear objective of influencing voters to support the mentioned candidate and party.  The timing of the post, considering the provided end date, needs to be checked against the official electoral calendar to determine if it falls within or outside the legally permitted campaign period.  If the post was published after the official campaign period ended, it would constitute a violation of Article 98 t) of LEGE nr. 208 din 20 iulie 2015.
</electoral-propaganda-analysis>
<electoral-propaganda-decision>TRUE</electoral-propaganda-decision>
<electoral-propaganda-candidates>
  <candidate><name>Valeriu Iftime</name><impact>POSITIVE</impact></candidate>
</electoral-propaganda-candidates>
<responsible-party-or-group>PNL</responsible-party-or-group>
<message-for-police>
[Jitaru Ovidiu], pentru încălcarea articolului 98 t) din LEGEA nr. 208 din 20 iulie 2015, prin publicarea unei reclame plătite pe Facebook după ora 18:00 pe 23.11.2024 (data trebuie verificată în raport cu calendarul electoral), cu mesajul "Hai la vot pe 1 decembrie! Votăm echipa PNL - Valeriu Iftime!", care îndeamnă direct la votarea candidatului Valeriu Iftime și a partidului PNL, având un efect electoral clar pozitiv pentru aceștia.  Reclama, cu ID-ul 1606080077000792, a fost difuzată pe Facebook și Instagram, având o estimare a bugetului de 200-299 RON și o estimare a vizualizărilor de 15.000-20.000.  Această acțiune constituie propagandă electorală după încheierea perioadei legale de campanie, conform articolului 98 t), întrucât îndeamnă la vot pentru un anumit candidat în ziua alegerilor.  Informațiile de contact ale advertiserului sunt contact@pnlbotosani.ro și +40759112233.
</message-for-police>
</conclusion>
</output>
```
